content: **drops christmas crochet drops doily in belle and christmas tree rug in snow with star and fan pattern** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-009 yarn group b doily and e or c + c christmas tree rug ----------------------- * **doily** **measurements** diameter approx 52 cm / 20½ **materials** drops belle from garnstudio 150 g color no 03 light beige drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm/e/4 or size needed to get 20 double_crochet x 10 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm * **christmas tree rug** **measurements** diameter approx 92 cm / 36 1/4 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 550 g color no 01 off white drops crochet hook size 7 mm/k or l or size needed to get 10 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm work doily and christmas tree carpet according to same pattern but with different yarn and crochet gauge work doily on hook size 3 5 mm with belle and carpet on hook size 7 mm with snow uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=7294&cid=19
